title: Mississippi Roast (Slow Cooker Pepperoncini Pot Roast) Recipe
description: Mississippi pepperoncini roast — cooked with ranch and au jus mix along with pepperoncini peppers, of course, is an easy, zesty slow cooker recipe.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Never lose a recipe: Join MyRecipes to save and find favorites from AR & beyond Recipes Main Dishes Beef Pot Roast Recipes Mississippi Roast (Slow Cooker Pepperoncini Pot Roast) 4.8 (433) 335 Reviews 46 Photos Slow cooker roast recipe, also called pepperoncini roast. Serve with egg noodles or mashed potatoes. Submitted by Pokerman11 Updated on August 20, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 46 46 46 46 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 8 hrs Total Time: 8 hrs 10 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 1 (4 pound) beef chuck roast ¼ cup butter 5 pepperoncini peppers 1 (1 ounce) packet ranch dressing mix 1 (1 ounce) packet dry au jus mix Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Place roast in a slow cooker. Form a pocket in the top of the roast and place butter, pepperoncini peppers, ranch dressing mix, and au jus mix in the pocket. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook on Low for 8 hours. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Serve and enjoy! Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Recipe Tip You can substitute beef round or beef brisket for beef chuck if desired. I Made It Print 1,183 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 537 Calories 39g Fat 6g Carbs 37g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 6 Calories 537 % Daily Value * Total Fat 39g 50% Saturated Fat 17g 87% Cholesterol 151mg 50% Sodium 1479mg 64% Total Carbohydrate 6g 2% Dietary Fiber 0g 1% Protein 37g 73% Vitamin C 0mg 0% Calcium 27mg 2% Iron 4mg 24% Potassium 351mg 7% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Mississippi Roast (Slow Cooker Pepperoncini Pot Roast) 01 of 46 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 46 Photo by  LoftySpoon1277 07/20/2023 I make this 7 - 10 times a year. It's almost perfect, except, I prefer to make this exact recipe using about 20 to 25 pepperoncini. 03 of 46 Photo by  GPJess 05/10/2022 Excellent. I changed everything except the slow-cooker.:-} Used 2 smaller London Broils, bottled ranch, crushed beef bullion cubes for the au jus. Sliced banana peppers w/ about 1/3 jar of the juice.Also did 4 hrs high.Cut "like butta..." 04 of 46 Photo by  Tim n karen 02/19/2021 05 of 46 Photo by  Plato442 11/06/2020 Like wow. This was excellent, it was spicier than I was hoping and was worried the rest of the family wouldn’t eat it...however it was polished off by everyone. I followed directions closely, used half of the pepperonis, but smoked it on the Traeger in a cast iron pan. This will be in the dinner rotation for some time! 06 of 46 Photo by  KingSeyfried 10/26/2020 Amazing recipe. Followed as is and just added more peppers and over mashed potatoes. Best pot roast I’ve ever had. 07 of 46 Photo by  Duke28540 10/07/2020 08 of 46 Photo by  gz 08/16/2020 09 of 46 Photo by  Andrea LaTrise Peoples 08/11/2020 10 of 46 Photo by  Faith N 02/13/2020 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Asian Pot Roast in an Instant Pot 14 Ratings Slow Cooker Au Jus Pot Roast 138 Ratings Instant Pot® Mississippi Roast 37 Ratings Instant Pot Yankee Pot Roast 9 Ratings Kris' Amazing Shredded Mexican Beef 211 Ratings Awesome Slow Cooker Pot Roast 9,832 Ratings Slow Cooker Pot Roast with Malbec (Red Wine) 72 Ratings Autumn Pot Roast II 12 Ratings Instant Pot® Kalua Pig (Quick Hawaiian Pulled Pork) 3 Ratings Awesome Slow Cooker Pot Roast Plus Extras Recipe 142 Ratings Barbacoa-Style Shredded Beef 244 Ratings Homestyle Kalua Pork with Cabbage in a Slow Cooker 152 Ratings Baja Pot Roast 25 Ratings Pot Roast in Beer 134 Ratings Oven Pot Roast 948 Ratings Simple Beef Pot Roast 723 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
